mapper.update:
update PHIP_ORG_DEPT_INFO
DIVISION_ROOT = #{divisionRoot,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPT_NAME = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPT_TYPE_CODE = #{deptTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPT_ROLE_NAME = #{deptRoleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPT_PARENT_CODE = #{deptParentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROLE_NAME = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROLE_STATE = #{roleState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EFFECTIVE_TIME_LOW = #{effectiveTimeLow,jdbcType=DATE},
EFFECTIVE_TIME_HIGH = #{effectiveTimeHigh,jdbcType=DATE},
EMPLOYER_ADDR = #{employerAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMPLOYER_TEL_NO = #{employerTelNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MSG_ID = #{msgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSIGNED_CODE = #{assignedCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSIGNED_NAME = #{assignedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSIGNED_DEPT_CODE = #{assignedDeptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSIGNED_CONTACT_PERSON = #{assignedContactPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATION_TIME = #{creationTime,jdbcType=DATE},
SORT_NUM = #{sortNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHARGE_INFO_PERSON = #{chargeInfoPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHARGE_INFO_TEL = #{chargeInfoTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPLAINTS_HOTLINE = #{complaintsHotline,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEGAL_REPRESENTATIVE = #{legalRepresentative,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEB_URL = #{webUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSTCODE = #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
G_LONGITUDE = #{glongitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
G_LATITUDE = #{glatitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROVINCE_CODE = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITY_CODE = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COUNTY_CODE = #{countyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STREET_CODE = #{streetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NEIGHBORHOOD_CODE = #{neighborhoodCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MODIFY_AT=sysdate
where
ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql:
SELECT PODI.*,p.NAME AS dept_type_name,a.name as PROVINCE_CODE_NAME ,b.name as CITY_CODE_NAME,c.name as COUNTY_CODE_NAME, d.name as STREET_CODE_NAME,e.name as NEIGHBORHOOD_CODE_NAME FROM PHIP_ORG_DEPT_INFO PODI LEFT JOIN (
) p ON PODI.dept_type_code=p.CODE --科室分类 left join phip_area_base_info a on PODI.PROVINCE_CODE=a.code left join phip_area_base_info b on PODI.CITY_CODE=b.code left join phip_area_base_info c on PODI.COUNTY_CODE=c.code left join phip_area_base_info d on PODI.STREET_CODE=d.code left join phip_area_base_info e on PODI.NEIGHBORHOOD_CODE=e.code

SELECT PODI.*,p.NAME AS dept_type_name,a.name as PROVINCE_CODE_NAME ,b.name as CITY_CODE_NAME,c.name as COUNTY_CODE_NAME, d.name as STREET_CODE_NAME,e.name as NEIGHBORHOOD_CODE_NAME FROM PHIP_ORG_DEPT_INFO PODI LEFT JOIN (
) p ON PODI.dept_type_code=p.CODE --机构分类 left join phip_area_base_info a on PODI.PROVINCE_CODE=a.code left join phip_area_base_info b on PODI.CITY_CODE=b.code left join phip_area_base_info c on PODI.COUNTY_CODE=c.code left join phip_area_base_info d on PODI.STREET_CODE=d.code left join phip_area_base_info e on PODI.NEIGHBORHOOD_CODE=e.code

SELECT PDI.CODE,PDI.NAME FROM PHIP_NATIONAL_STANDARDS PNS JOIN PHIP_DICT_CATALOG PDC ON PNS.DICT_CODE= PDC.CODE JOIN PHIP_DICT_ITEM PDI ON PDC.ID =PDI.FK_CATALOG_ID WHERE PNS.CODE_SYSTEM = '${oidValue}'
